title: Nerf Vayne to oblivion or just delete her...
body: No matter what happen , Vayne remain on top tier pick rate on ADC and is NEVER WEAK... Hell in her first week after release she was straight broken... % max health true damage mixed with stealth and dash every 4 second is no good.. Remove this abomination or nerf her early game to trash so she can't stomp early game where it's suppose to be her weakness!

replies.body: Vayne was weak for the majority of the last few seasons. Barely even a valid pick.

People have very selective memories. Vayne has absolutely spent time out of the meta in the past few years.

ADCs tend to cycle very quickly in the meta. Vayne has some terrible lane matchups. She tends to fall heavily out of favor when her lane counters are strong and popular. 

Targons/overheal was a free pass through the laning phase. She got heavy late game nerfs on top of nerfs to the item that was letting her coast through the early game. Let's wait to see where she falls out before calling for further nerfs.
